name: Food Products
description: All edible products including processed foods, beverages, and dietary supplements

mandatory.name: Microbiological Testing
mandatory.details: Testing for harmful bacteria, yeasts, and molds

mandatory.name: Nutritional Analysis
mandatory.details: Complete nutritional profile including macronutrients and micronutrients

optional.name: Allergen Testing
optional.details: Testing for common allergens like gluten, nuts, dairy

optional.name: Heavy Metals Testing
optional.details: Testing for lead, mercury, cadmium, and arsenic

blocked_countries.reason: Trade embargo due to political sanctions
Food safety concerns and regulatory non-compliance

label_requirements.details: Must list all ingredients in descending order by weight
Must include calories, fats, carbohydrates, proteins per serving
Must clearly state presence of major allergens

name: Cosmetics
description: Personal care products including skincare, makeup, and fragrances

mandatory.name: Safety Assessment
mandatory.details: Comprehensive safety evaluation of all ingredients

mandatory.name: Microbiological Testing
mandatory.details: Testing for bacterial and fungal contamination

optional.name: Stability Testing
optional.details: Testing product stability under various conditions

blocked_countries.reason: Regulatory restrictions on certain cosmetic ingredients

label_requirements.details: All ingredients must be listed using International Nomenclature of Cosmetic Ingredients
Clear instructions for safe use and application
Any necessary safety warnings or precautions
